spell_tooltip.description: Fire Breath burns away 1 beneficial Magic effect per empower level from all targets.
Hover makes you immune to movement speed reduction effects.
Deep Breath forms curtains of fire, preventing line of sight to enemies outside its walls and burning enemies who walk through them for 770,042 Fire damage. Lasts 6 sec.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 681,812, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 220,051. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 374,326 upon removing any effect.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your healing done and healing received are increased by 12%.
Disorient an enemy for 20 sec, causing them to sleep walk towards you. Damage has a chance to awaken them.
Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 6%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 169,909 when cast.
Let out a bone-shaking roar at enemies in a cone in front of you, increasing the duration of crowd controls that affect them by 50% in the next 10 sec.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Green spells restore 10% more health.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Deep Breath stuns enemies for 3 sec.
Conjure an updraft to lift you and your 4 nearest allies within 20 yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Wrap an ally with temporal energy, healing them for 296,569 and causing your next healing spell to cast an additional time on that ally at 105% of normal healing. Essence spells cannot be Echoed.

Inhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing yourself and 5 injured allies in a 30 yd cone in front of you for 584,081.

I:   Heals 104,392 instantly and 479,689 over 16 sec.

II:  Heals 224,314 instantly and 359,766 over 12 sec.

III: Heals 344,236 instantly and 239,844 over 8 sec.

Reverse an ally's injuries, instantly healing them for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec and an additional 378,674 over 15.6 sec.

When Reversion critically heals, its duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.
Each cast of a Bronze spell causes your next empower spell to reach maximum level in 10% less time, stacking up to 4 times.
Living Flame has a 20% chance, and Reversion has a 15% chance to make your next Essence ability free. Stacks 2 times.

Rewind 33% of damage taken in the last 5 seconds by all allies within 40 yds. Always heals for at least 195,298.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.

Divert spiritual energy, healing an ally for 1.2 million. Jumps to injured allies within 30 yds when empowered.

I:   Heals one ally.

II:  Heals a second ally.

III: Heals a third ally.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
Stretch time around an ally for the next 10.4 sec, causing 50% of damage they would take to instead be dealt over 10.4 sec.

Commune with the Emerald Dream, restoring 20% health and 2% mana every 0.9 sec for 4.4 sec. Overhealing is transferred to an injured ally within 40 yds.

Castable while stunned, disoriented, incapacitated, or silenced.
Spiritbloom's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1.
Reversion instantly heals the target for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec.
Send forward a vortex of temporal energy, absorbing 149,730 damage on you and any allies in its path. Absorption is reduced beyond 5 targets.
Emerald Communion increases your maximum health by 20% for 15 sec.
Echo replicates 50% more healing.
Empower spells cause time to flow 5% faster for you, increasing movement speed, cooldown recharge rate, and cast speed. Lasts 10 sec.
Temporal Anomaly applies Echo at 30% effectiveness to the first 5 allies it passes through.
Verdant Embrace increases the healing of your next Dream Breath by 40%, or your next Living Flame by 100%.
Reversion has 2 charges.
Fire Breath heals 5 nearby injured allies for 80% of damage done to up to 5 targets, split evenly among them.
Disintegrate deals 35% more damage and generates 126,000 mana over its duration.
Living Flame and Fire Breath deal additional damage and healing equal to 4.0% of your maximum health.
Reversion, Time Dilation, Echo, and Temporal Anomaly last 60% longer and cost 60% less mana.
Reversion healing has a chance to cause your next Living Flame to cast instantly and deal 50% increased healing or damage. Stacks up to 2 charges.
Your healing is increased by 10% on targets with your Reversion.
Causes your next 3 helpful spells to be duplicated and stored in a time lock. You may reactivate Stasis any time within 30 sec to quickly unleash their magic.
Living Flame is enhanced with Bronze magic, repeating 15% of the damage or healing you dealt to the target in the last 5 sec as Arcane, up to 267,375.

Hover now causes you to briefly warp out of existence and appear at your destination. Hover's cooldown is also reduced by 5 sec.

Hover continues to allow Evoker spells to be cast while moving.
Tip the Scales overloads you with temporal energy, increasing your haste, movement speed, and cooldown recovery rate by 30%, decreasing over 30 sec.
Spiritbloom heals for an additional 30% over 8 sec.
Warp reduces damage taken by 20%, starting high and reducing over 3 sec.

Casting an empower spell during Temporal Burst causes a nearby ally to gain a Thread of Fate for 10 sec, granting them a chance to echo their damage or healing spells, dealing 15% of the amount again.
For each healing over time effect from Spiritbloom, gain 3% haste, up to 9%.
When Dream Breath or Fire Breath critically strike, their duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.
Each time you cast an empower spell, unstable time magic reduces its cooldown by up to 6 sec.
Casting Echo has a 20% chance to cause your next Echo to be 100% more effective.
Empower spells send up to 3 Chrono Flames to your targets.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 681,812, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 220,051. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 374,326 upon removing any effect.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your healing done and healing received are increased by 12%.

Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 6%.

Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.

Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 169,909 when cast.

Reversion, Time Dilation, Echo, and Temporal Anomaly last 60% longer and cost 60% less mana.
Every 3 Emerald Blossoms leaves behind a tiny sprout which gathers 10% of your healing over 8 sec. The sprout then heals allies within 30 yds, divided evenly among targets.
Reversion healing has a chance to cause your next Living Flame to cast instantly and deal 50% increased healing or damage. Stacks up to 2 charges.
Hover, Deep Breath, and Dream Flight travel 40% faster, and Hover travels 40% further.
Engulf reduces the cooldown of Fire Breath and Dream Breath by 6 sec.
Essence abilities are enhanced with Flame, dealing 20% of healing or damage done as Fire over 8 sec.
Critical strike chance against targets above 50% health increased by 15%.
Engulf quickens your pulse, reducing the cast time of your next spell by 30%. Stacks up to 2 charges.
Fire Breath and Dream Breath deal their damage and healing in 20% less time.
Living Flame has 1 extra chance to trigger Essence Burst when it critically strikes.
Engulf gains 1 additional charge and deals 20% increased damage and healing.
Renewing Blaze also applies to your target or 1 nearby injured ally at 50% value.
Engulf consumes 2 sec of Dream Breath from the target, detonating it and healing all nearby targets equal to 300% of the amount consumed, reduced beyond 5 targets.
While Obsidian Scales is active you gain immunity to interrupt, silence, and pushback effects.
Fire Breath burns away 1 beneficial Magic effect per empower level from all targets.
Deep Breath forms curtains of fire, preventing line of sight to enemies outside its walls and burning enemies who walk through them for 770,042 Fire damage. Lasts 6 sec.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.

Fly to an ally and heal them for 681,812, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 220,051. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 374,326 upon removing any effect.

Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your Leech is increased by 2%.
Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 6%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 169,909 when cast.
Let out a bone-shaking roar at enemies in a cone in front of you, increasing the duration of crowd controls that affect them by 50% in the next 10 sec.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Redirect your excess magic to a friendly healer for 1 hour. When you cast an empowered spell, you restore 0.25% of their maximum mana per empower level. Limit 1.

Deep Breath stuns enemies for 3 sec.
Conjure an updraft to lift you and your 4 nearest allies within 20 yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Lob a ball of flame, dealing 227,837 Fire damage to the target and nearby enemies.

I:   3 yd radius.

II:  6 yd radius.

III: 9 yd radius.

Fly to the targeted location, exposing Temporal Wounds on enemies in your path for 10 sec.

Temporal Wounds accumulate 10% of damage dealt by your allies affected by Ebon Might, then critically strike for that amount as Arcane damage.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.

Fatal attacks are diverted into a nearby timeline, preventing the damage, and your death, in this one.

The release of temporal energy restores 1.6 million health to you, and 548,787 to 4 nearby allies, over 9 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.

May only occur once every 6 min.

While flying during Deep Breath, 50% of damage you would take is instead dealt over 10 sec.

Protect an ally with 15 explosive dragonscales, increasing their Armor by 20% of your own.

Blistering Scales can only be placed on one target at a time. Casts on your enemy's target if they have one.

Learn to attune yourself to the essence of the Black or Bronze Dragonflights:

Black Attunement: You and your 4 nearest allies have 2% increased maximum health.

Bronze Attunement:You and your 4 nearest allies have 10% increased movement speed.

Affects the nearest ally within 25 yds, preferring damage dealers, if you do not have an ally targeted.

Consuming Essence Burst grants you 5% Intellect for 6 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.

Hover activates Bronze Attunement, and amplifies it to increase movement speed by 40% for 4 sec.

Surge forward in time, causing your cooldowns to recover 1,000% faster for 2 sec.

Deep Breath grants you Fury of the Aspects for 15 sec after you land, without causing Exhaustion.

Fire Breath causes enemies to take up to 40% increased damage from your Black spells, increased based on its empower level.

Hover now causes you to briefly warp out of existence and appear at your destination. Hover's cooldown is also reduced by 5 sec.

Hover continues to allow Evoker spells to be cast while moving.

Spiritbloom heals for an additional 30% over 8 sec.
Warp reduces damage taken by 20%, starting high and reducing over 3 sec.

Casting an empower spell during Temporal Burst causes a nearby ally to gain a Thread of Fate for 10 sec, granting them a chance to echo their damage or healing spells, dealing 15% of the amount again.
For each healing over time effect from Spiritbloom, gain 3% haste, up to 9%.
When Dream Breath or Fire Breath critically strike, their duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.
Each time you cast an empower spell, unstable time magic reduces its cooldown by up to 6 sec.
Casting Echo has a 20% chance to cause your next Echo to be 100% more effective.
Empower spells send up to 3 Chrono Flames to your targets.
